name: lmsys/chatbot_arena_conversations
description: The Chatbot Arena Conversations Dataset is a valuable resource for those interested in the field of chatbot evaluation and human-chatbot interaction. Comprising 33,000 cleaned conversations, the dataset was collected from the Chatbot Arena platform between April and June 2023. Each sample includes a variety of metadata, such as question ID, model names, conversation text, user vote, anonymized user ID, language tag, moderation API tag, toxic tag, and timestamp, offering a rich dataset for researchers and developers to analyze and improve chatbot performance.
citeAs: @misc{zheng2023judging,       title={Judging LLM-as-a-judge with MT-Bench and Chatbot Arena},        author={Lianmin Zheng and Wei-Lin Chiang and Ying Sheng and Siyuan Zhuang and Zhanghao Wu and Yonghao Zhuang and Zi Lin and Zhuohan Li and Dacheng Li and Eric. P Xing and Hao Zhang and Joseph E. Gonzalez and Ion Stoica},       year={2023},       eprint={2306.05685},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.CL} }
creator: lmsys
keywords: Chatbot Evaluation, Human-Chatbot Interaction, Multi-modal Data
task: Conversational Analysis, Chatbot Evaluation, Toxicity Detection
